Initial commit: Unicorn Hunt game

A fun arcade game where you catch unicorns with a rainbow net
while defending your pot of gold from mischievous leprechauns.

- Rainbow net follows mouse to catch unicorns
- Click to shoot leprechauns
- 7-color rainbow health system \(ROYGBIV\)

- Animated rain drops during boss fights
- Thunder flash screen effect
- Lightning bolts with warning indicators
- Hurricane spiral visual effect
- Screen shake on impacts

TOUCH SUPPORT:
- Full touch event handling

- Position tracking for player net
